headline.main: NEW COURSE DICTATES NEUTRALITY ACT REPEAL; Expert Advises State Department To Acknowledge Law's Worth in Giving Us Time to Arm

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 4 -- The State Department has been advised, by at least one of those experts whom it summoned to help draft the so-called Neutrality Act, that repeal or fundamental revision of the law will be obtained more easily and expeditiously if the argument is expanded from a mere attack on the act and expressions of Executive regret that it was ever advocated by the Administration.
